description: A fast-drying, ultralightweight and breathable windshirt with Capilene® Cool Lightweight material in the hood and sleeves. Longer sleeves make it possible to tuck in your hands so you can skip the gloves. A slim-fit hood provides extra warmth and protection in lieu of a hat and a DWR (durable water repellent) finish provides some weather resistance. Packs down into the back neck for easy stowability. Fair Trade Certified™ sewn.
name: Patagonia Airshed Pro Pullover - Mens
